sentences.sContent: My job can be very frustrating sometimes.
sentences.sCn: 有时候我的工作令人很沮丧。

sentences.sContent: This is an immensely frustrating experience for the student.
sentences.sCn: 对于学生来说，这是非常令人沮丧的经历。

trans.tranCn: 令人泄气的， 使人沮丧的
trans.tranOther: making you feel annoyed, upset, or impatient because you cannot do what you want to do
